S

setBufferSize(int) - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioBindingParameters
Indicates that a specified number of bytes should be reserved when reading from or writing to a client.
setOption(SocketOption<T>, T) - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
 
setSSLContext(SSLContext) - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioBindingParameters
Indicates that connections should use a specified SSLContext to encrypt communications.
setSSLContext(SSLContext, SSLParameters) - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioBindingParameters
Indicates that connections should use a specified SSLContext with the specified SSLParameters to encrypt communications.
setTimeout(long) - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioBindingParameters
Indicates that connections which have not received data for a specified number of milliseconds should be disconnected.
shutdown() - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioServer
Asynchronously instructs the JNioServer to cleanly shut down, disconnecting all clients.
shutdownInput() - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
 
shutdownOutput() - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
 
socket() - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
 
SSLChannel - Class in net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl
The SSLChannel class is a wrapper class which implements SSL using a provided SSLEngine over a SocketChannel.
SSLChannel(SocketChannel, SSLEngine, Executor) - Constructor for class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
Constructs a new SSLChannel backed by a specified SocketChannel, using a specified SSLEngine for encryption/decryption, and optionally using a specified Executor to perform time intensive tasks.
SSLListener - Interface in net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl
The SSLListener interface contains methods which are called by an SSLChannel when various interesting events occur.
supportedOptions() - Method in class net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
